text: melum evar tam manaiviyarait taykalenak kuriya pin (varuntit) tam kuriyatai vittum tirumpi (mintum tampattiya valvai nati)nal, avviruvarum oruvarai oruvar tintuvatarku munnar or atimaiyai vituvikka ventum. Atanaik konte ninkal upatecikkappatukirirkal - melum, allah, ninkal ceypavarrai nankaripavanaka irukkinran
